DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to compare frequency and content of reflux episodes in patients with gastroesophageal reflux disease.
DOC.criteria: Provision of written consent GERD patients, age 1870 years, females must be postmenopausal or surgically sterilised 6 months history of GERD and incomplete response to PPI treatment Insufficient symptom burden of the reflux disease evaluated by questionnaires Screatinine >1.2 times upper limit of normal History of heart disease Prior surgery of the upper GI tract
